page.title: 10SHOPPING IN CHEADLE HULME.
page.content: We had a look at the shops in our part of {Cheadle Hulme.}There are four main shopping areas. Two of these areas are neighbourhood shops but the other two areas are main areas.{Cheadle Hulme {Precinct}is one of the larger shopping areas. It is a small{T}shaped precinct and it contains two large supermarkets a large sports wear shop, a furniture shop and opticians and several other food shops.{Station Road and Ravenoak {Road}is the other large shopping area. It has several non-food shops, including a gunsmiths, an antique shop and a wool shop.In the smaller neighbourhood shops which are on {Turves Road}and{Cheadle Road}there are general shops such as chemists, butchers and wine shops.Also in{ {Cheadle Road}shops there is a smallish garden centre.
